Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased this HDTV
Reviews.Author: Steven Loft
Reviews.Content: Bought because Sansui old established Japanese electronics company. Amazon honored guaranteed low price as BB was selling for $70 less. Enhanced delivery was as promised, guys delivered after big snow. Set up for set was easy, used HDMI cable instead of Fios connections. Picture clear and crisp, only tweaked a little. Sound good. Happy with purchase and Amazon.

ProductInfo.Name: Sansui SLED5000 50-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HD TV
